title: un padam aDaikkalamE
sahitya:
un padam aDaikkalamE en tAyE anbin uruvamE AnandamE enrum


anupallavi

  kaN pArttaruL tara maN mIdinil enakkum taNai anri vEru yAr uLarO ualagil everO ariyEn


caraNam    rattina mEDai mEl tattaiyin mozhi kETTum tattuva malar mEvum padam tannai vaikkum
ponnira paTTu kugil tarikkum pAnguDan vINai mITTum pAvaiyE mAtangiyE 
				(madhyamakAla)
  		pani mazhai tandiDum kanai mozhi umaiyE
